      • getJoinableGames

        public Lobby getJoinableGames(int version,
                              java.lang.String token)
                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        First method called to init joinable games. We pass a Lobby object that is serializable, but only with the joinable games. We don't want to pass ALL the games, as this is redundant information for the client.
        Specified by:
